channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- GeForce Experience
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- GeForce Experience

item.title: CVE-2022-31611|2024-08-03T07:26:00.891Z -- nvidia -- geforce%20experience
item.description: NVIDIA GeForce Experience contains an uncontrolled search path vulnerability in all its client installers, where an attacker with user level privileges may cause the installer to load an arbitrary DLL when the installer is launched. A successful exploit of this vulnerability could lead to escalation of privileges and code execution.
